CustomField.description: US-0008132 : Deals - Subsidy Formula enable manual update US-TBD, US-0009686 - Hypercare: Updates needed to NA Deal Statement Attachment
CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Deal_V1', IF( EBH_DealEndDate__c <= DATEVALUE( NOW() ) - 31 , EBH_Payout_SI_calc__c * EBH_Subsidy__c, 0 ), EBH_Payout_SI_calc__c * EBH_Subsidy__c )
CustomField.label: Subsidy Final (Gross) Servicing
